data.title: List of Cities in Washington: Area, Population and Cost of Living
data.meta_description: List of Cities in Washington: Know about the list of major cities in Washington and their details like area, population, cost of living, interesting facts and other details.
data.text:
Promotion of diverse art, native American heritage and one of the prime bases of global companies, the State of Washington is iconic for its bustling metropolitan areas and attractions.

You can explore these wide ranges of experiences, including fresh coastal flavours and eastern vineyards at the birthplace of Starbucks in some of the prominent cities in Washington State.

Currency: The standard currency is USD or United States Dollar. As on 07th August 2023, 1 USD is measured at 82.73 INR.

Here are some unknown facts about the top cities in Washington State:

Spokane, one of the smallest cities in Washington, hosted the Worldâ€™s Fair in 1974. This is a prestigious event to unveil new wonders of the modern world.

The total population of Washington State is estimated to be 79,51,150 as of 1st April 2023 by the Office of Financial Management, making it the 13th most populous sate in the county.

Also known as the Evergreen State, Washington is covered with coniferous trees, making it an ideal destination for hiking. You can find Douglas Fir, Sitka spruce, Alpine larches and Western Hemlock mostly along the trails.

The ferry service of Washington is the 2nd largest auto-carrying system in the world. 21 fleet of ferries serve routes like Puget Sound, San Juan Islands, the greater Salish Sea and the western coast of Washington.

Washington State is an ideal choice to pursue higher studies. It is home to several universities and over 300 private colleges and career schools. This includes Washington State University, University of Washington, Seattle University, Gonzaga University and many more.

However, before you visit either of the cities in Washington State for business, vacation, or higher education, contact the local embassy to steer clear of any confusion. When travelling to any of these cities, it is important to have a travel insurance from a reliable source. Also, irrespective of which time of the year you are visiting, carry rain gear and a light jacket, given the notoriously extreme weather.
